header_text: You have been feeling really overwhelmed and drained recently and want to go on a trip to take a break. When you look into flights, you realize that the cost of a trip may be totally out of your budget. You remind yourself you can go for a short trip somewhere nearby and still have fun.

elements.Text: Can you still take time for yourself on a budget?
